dialog-add-exchange-portfolio.title: Creation of exchange portfolio
dialog-add-exchange-portfolio.description_placeholder: Portfolio consisting of the riskiest and the most promising assets across the market. Be prepared to say goodbye to your sleep and money.
dialog-add-exchange-portfolio.api_key_rule: We ask only for read permissions. It doesn't provide us access to your personal keys or ability to transfer your funds. We need it only to show you effectiveness of your portfolio and analytics.

BINANCE.1: On a Binance exchange website open API Management section
BINANCE.2: Create new API key , name it, for example "DUST Portfolio", and press "Next"
BINANCE.5:
IT IS DESIRABLE to disable access to trading for this API key, to do this:
  1. Click "Edit restrictions"
  2. Disable "Enable Spot & Margin Trading"
  3. Clcik "Save"
  4. Введите код Двухфактороной аутентификации
